HiddenText.Name: CE Quest fall Q9
HiddenText.OpenningText: Where do I stay while attending classes on campus?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Students will arrange their own housing at the location of their choosing. Be sure to inquire about block contacts (1/2 semester) when dealing with BYU-Idaho Housing or at off-campus apartment complexes. If you would like to share a contract with another Quest student, or you need specific housing help, please contact (208) 496-1250 or send an email to quest@byui.edu.
